fusion: FUSION is one of the six damage types in the game. Can be related to Fire
glacio: GLACIO is one of the six damage types in the game. Can be related to Ice
aero: AERO is one of the six damage types in the game. Can be related to Wind
electro: ELECTRO is one of the six damage types in the game.
spectro: SPECTRO is one of the six damage types in the game.
havoc: HAVOC is one of the six damage types in the game.
rectifier: Rectifier is one of the 5 type of Weapons in game, common in "non-phisical" characters.
sword: Sword is one of the 5 type of Weapons in game, common in "phisical" characters.
broadblade: Broadblade is one of the 5 type of Weapons in game, common in "phisical" characters.
gauntlets: Gauntlet is one of the 5 type of Weapons in game, common in "phisical" characters.
pistols: Pistols is one of the 5 type of Weapons in game, common in "long-raged" characters.
info: Due to the defense calculation not being exact, may vary by an average of 6.5% of the actual in-game value.
name: Name
help1:
Raw Damage: It is your character's damage, ignoring any other type of mechanic (defense, resistance).
Use Raw Damage column as a basis to know if your character is better or worse, since it has no external variables.

Common Enemy DMG: Damage stipulated on common enemies, without resistance to their element
RES (resistent) Enemy DMG: Damage stipulated on enemies with resistance to your element.
In-game DMG is purely informative, for better metrics use the Raw Damage column.
delete: Are you sure? This action can't be undone

modes.full: Current mode: Show all damage detailed

characters.aalto: Aalto is a character with AERO elemental bonus, Aalto's main characteristis are his Concerto Efficiency and AERO DMG Amplification in 23% to other characters, with their ability Outro: Dissolving Mist.
characters.baizhi: Baihzi is a character with GLACIO elemental bonus, but her main role is Healing and support the team with her skills, as well buff with DMG Amplification in 15% with Outro: Rejuvinating Flow. Baihzi skills are affected by maximum HP value
characters.calcharo: Calcharo is a character with ELECTRO elemental bonus, Calcharo's main role is Main Damage Dealer with Basic and Resonance Liberation Damage, since liberation swaps his basic attacks and uses the basic/heavy bonuses.
characters.changli: Changli is a character with FUSION elemental bonus, Changli's main characteristis are her FUSION DMG Amplification in 20% and Liberation DMG Amplification in 25% to other characters, with their ability Outro: Strategy of Duality. Also can be a Main DPS with focus on Ressonance Skill and Liberation DMG
characters.chixia: Chixia is a character with FUSION elemental bonus, Chixia's main role are Main DPS with focus on Forte Circuit DAKA DAKA and Boom Boom.
characters.danjin: Danjin is a character with HAVOC elemental bonus, Danjin's main role is Deal Damage in her rotation and increase HAVOC DMG in 23% with her Outro: Duality.
characters.encore: Encore is a character with FUSION elemental bonus, Encore's main role are Main DPS with focus on Basic Attacks, once her Liberation uses Basic Damage Bonus.
characters.jianxin: Jianxin is a character with AERO elemental bonus, Jianxin main focus is the Liberation DMG Amplification in 38% with Outro: Transcendence, she also generate Shields and also deals damage in Heavy Attacks.
characters.jinhsi: Jinhsi is a character with SPECTRO elemental bonus. The Main role for Jihnsi is Main DPS, focused on Resonance Skill Damage.
characters.jiyan: Jiyan is a character with AERO elemental bonus, Jiyan's main role is Main DPS, with focus on Heavy Attack DMG, since his liberation is considered as Heavy Attack.
characters.lingyang: Lingyang is a character with GLACIO elemental bonus, Lingyang is a Main DPS, with focus on Basic and Skill damage.
characters.mortefi: Mortefi is a character with FUSION elemental bonus, The highlight of Mortefi is that its Resonance Liberation affects all other characters after its use, for a few seconds Mortefi will attack along with the other characters even outside the field. Mortefi also increase Heavy Attack DMG in 38% after his Outro Skill: Rage Transposition.
characters.roverh: Rover (Havoc Ver.) is a character with HAVOC elemental bonus, Rover's is a Main DPS based on Forte Rotation.
characters.rover: Rover (Spectro Ver.) is a character with SPECTRO elemental bonus, Rover Spectro can be used as Main DPS, but Rover's highlight is the unique skill Stagnation, causing enemies in range to "freeze in time" in Outro: Instant.
characters.sanhua: Sanhua is a character with GLACIO elemental bonus. Her highlight is Basic Attack DMG Amplification in 38% to next character with Outro: Silversnow. Also can be used as Sub DPS with Heavy Attack Forte.
characters.taoqi: Taoqi is a character with HAVOC elemental bonus, Taoqi uses DEF as bonus in some skills. Taoqi can deal damage on Resonance Liberation focused on DEF status, but her highlight is the Resonance Skill Amplification in 38% to next character with Outro : Iron Will.
characters.shorekeeper: The Shorekeeper is a character with an elemental bonus SPECTRO, although she can cause some damage, her main focus is healing the team< /b>, standing out for its Resonance Liberation which, in addition to healing, can increase Critical Chance and Critical Damage by up to 12.5% ​​and 25 % respectively.
characters.verina: Verina is a character with an elemental bonus SPECTRO, her main focus is healing the team, Verina heal uses pure ATK and with Outro: Blossom will apply an All damage Amplification in 15%.
characters.xiangliyao: Xiangli Yao is a character with an elemental bonus ELECTRO, his main role is Main DPS focused on Resonance Liberation DMG.
characters.yangyang: Yangyang is a character with AERO elemental bonus, Yangyang's highlight are her Resonance Energy Regeneration Buff in 20 points with her Outro: Whispering Breeze.
characters.yinlin: Yinlin is a character with an elemental bonus ELECTRO, she can act as a Main DPS focused on Resonance Liberation, but her highlight is the role of Sub DPS/Team support with Electro DMG Amplification in 20% and Resonance Liberation DMG Amplification in 25% with her Outro: Strategist
characters.yuanwu: Yuanwu is a character with an elemental bonus ELECTRO, Yuanwu can do some damage with your Forte rotation, but his highlight is the Outro: Lightning Manipulation, causing Vibration Reduction (stun bar) and Interruption Boost.
characters.zhezhi: Zhezhi is a character with GLACIO elemental bonus, her damage is based on Basic Attacks but with emphasis on Glacio DMG Amplification in 20% and Resonance Skill DMG Amplification in 25% with Outro: Radiant Ruin

enhancer.fixedCritInfo: Based on a 20 basic attack scenario, with {{chance}}% critical chance, {{qtd}} attacks would be critical and {{normal}} would not be, fixing the damage we would have the simulation represented by the following table:
enhancer.rotationInfo: Based on popular rotations, the following attacks are used:
enhancer.rotationCritInfo: A total of {{atkNum}} attacks will happen, with {{chance}}% critical chances, {{qtd}} attacks would be critical and {{normal}} would not be, fixing the damage we would have the simulation represented by the following table:
enhancer.healingInfo: As a healing focus character, critical damage or chance and overall damage it's not that relevant, so the focus will be on how much well be healed
enhancer.randomCritInfo: Leaving random critics, we have the simulation represented by the following table

echo.disclaimer: All Echos are considered 5* and Level 25. A simulation character is created with 1000 in all value attributes and 10% in all percentage attributes
echo.text: Echo {{echo}} has {{perc}}% more {{type}} points ({{value}} VS {{value2}}) in {{char}} rotation.
echo.same: It seems that both Echoes reach the same values ​​of {{type}} points.
echo.because: This could be because Echo 1 has {{attr}} recommended attributes VS {{attr2}} recommended attributes from Echo 2, which helps with {{char}} rotation.
echo.however: However, Echo 1 has {{attr}} recommended attributes VS {{attr2}} recommended attributes from Echo 2, these additional attributes can help the rotation in other ways besides {{type}} values.
echo.aalto:
Bacause:
Aalto spends little time on the battlefield, he must deal as much damage as possible before going to the main DPS with the Outro skill buff's. Therefore, focusing on critical rate/dmg and ATK would be the most recommended.
echo.baizhi:
Because:
Baizhi healing power is bases on her MAX HP, so it is necessary to focus on HP as echo's secondary attributes and in echo 1. Energy Regen for fast Outro skill load and Healing %, only avaible in Echo cost 4.
echo.calcharo:
Because:
Calcharo deal damages based on his ATK and Electro DMG, he uses Basic and Liberation DMG Bonus when in Liberation State, so is important to focus on critical stats in overall, electro bonus and basic/liberation DMG%.

basics.aalto:
Half Truths
Aalto fires up to 5 consecutive shots, dealing Aero DMG. Basic Attack 4 will spread the "Mist" forward, which lasts for 1.5s.

Heavy Attack
Aalto enters the aiming state for a more powerful shot. The aimed shot fired after charging finishes deals Aero DMG.

Mid-air Attack
Aalto consumes Stamina to perform consecutive shots at the target in mid-air, dealing Aero DMG.

Dodge Counter
Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Aero DMG.
basics.baizhi:
Destined Promise
Baizhi instructs You'tan to perform up to 4 consecutive attacks, dealing Glacio DMG.

Heavy Attack
Baizhi continuously consumes STA to command You'tan to attack enemies, dealing Glacio DMG. During Heavy Attack, Baizhi can command You'tan to move.

Mid-air Attack
Baizhi consumes STA and summons You'tan in mid-air to perform a Plunging Attack, dealing Glacio DMG.

Dodge Counter
Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Glacio DMG.
basics.calcharo:
Basic Attack
Calcharo performs up to 4 consecutive attacks, dealing Electro DMG.

Heavy Attack
Consumes STA to attack the target, dealing Electro DMG.

Mid-air Attack
Consumes STA to perform a Mid-Air Plunging Attack, dealing Electro DMG.

Dodge Counter
Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Electro DMG.

skills.aalto:
Mist Avatar
Casts "Mist" and 1 "Mist Avatar(s)" to taunt the surrounding targets. The avatars inherit a portion of Aalto's HP and generate 6 Mist Bullets around them, dealing Aero DMG.

Mist Bullets
Deals Aero DMG, considered as Resonance Skill DMG.
skills.baizhi:
Emergency Plan
Baizhi calls You'tan to attack the target, dealing Glacio DMG while immediately healing all characters on nearby teams.
skills.calcharo:
Extermination Order
Calcharo performs up to 3 consecutive attacks, dealing Electro DMG.
If Calcharo is switched off field, or if Resonance Skill Extermination Order is not activated again in a while, this skill will enter Cooldown.
Resonance Skill Extermination Order does not interrupt Calcharo's Basic Attack cycle.

liberations.aalto:
Flower in the Mist
Generate a "Gate of Quandary" in front, dealing Aero DMG. When bullets pass through the "Gate of Quandary", they deal increased DMG. "Gate of Quandary" lasts for 10s.
liberations.baizhi:
Momentary Union
Baizhi summons You'tan to heal all characters on nearby teams, generating 4 stacks of Remnant Entities.

Remnant Entities
Remnant Entities follow the active team members. 1 stack(s) of Remnant Entities are automatically consumed to perform Coordinated Attacks every 2.5s, dealing Glacio DMG on hit while healing all characters of the team when the active character is within the range.
liberations.calcharo:
Phantom Etching
Calcharo attacks the target, dealing Electro DMG and enters Deathblade Gear state. After Deathblade Gear state ends, Calcharo's next Intro Skill is replaced with Intro Skill "Necessary Means", which deals Electro DMG, considered as Intro Skill DMG.

Deathblade Gear
-Basic Attack is replaced with Basic Attack Hounds Roar.
-Heavy Attack deals increased DMG, considered as Resonance Liberation DMG.
-Dodge Counter deals increased DMG, considered as Resonance Liberation DMG.

Basic Attack: Hounds Roar
Calcharo performs up to 5 consecutive attacks, dealing Electro DMG, considered as Basic Attack DMG.

intros.aalto:
Feint Shot
Aalto shows up out of thin air to perform rapid continuous shooting, dealing Aero DMG.
intros.baizhi:
Overflowing Frost
Baizhi calls You'tan to perform 1 plunging attack, dealing Glacio DMG while healing all characters on a nearby team.
intros.calcharo:
Wanted Outlaw
Attack the target, dealing Electro DMG.

outros.aalto:
Dissolving Mist
The incoming Resonator has their Aero DMG Amplified by 23% for 14s or until they are switched out.
outros.baizhi:
Rejuvinating Flow
Heal the incoming Resonator by 1.54% of Baizhi's max HP every 3s for 30s. The healed Resonator has their DMG Amplified by 15% for 6s.
outros.calcharo:
Shadowy Raid
Calcharo summons Phantom to support the active Resonator, clearing the targets in front with a slash. The Phantom's attack deals Electro DMG equal to 195.98%+391.96% of Calcharo's ATK.

fortes.aalto:
Misty Cover
When Aalto passes through "Mist" or "Gate of Quandary", he enters the Mistcloak Dash.

Mistcloak Dash
-Movement speed increased;
-During this period, "Mist Drops" are continuously consumed, and for each 1 "Mist Drop" consumed, 1 Mist Bullet(s) is generated.

Mist Drops
Aalto can hold up to 6 "Mist Drops"
When Basic Attack or Mid-air Attack passes through "Mist" and hits the target, 1 "Mist Drop" is recovered.
fortes.baizhi:
You'tan
A Remnant Creature that answers to Baizhi's mind and desires while sharing all her stats. You'tan goes back to Baizhi when Baizhi dodges.

Concentration
Baizhi consumes all "Concentration" when casting Heavy Attack or Resonance Skill Emergency Plan to continuously heal all Resonators on nearby teams. Each 1 "Concentration" consumed provides 1 healing, the healing happen every 2s.
- When Baizhi consumes "Concentration" to cast Heavy Attack, Baizhi additionally restores Concerto Energy and Resonance Energy.
- When Baizhi consumes "Concentration" to cast Resonance Skill Emergency Plan, Baizhi additionally restores Concerto Energy.

Forte Gauge: Concentration
- Baizhi can hold up to 4 "Concentration".
- Baizhi obtains 1 "Concentration" for every Basic Attack on hit.
fortes.calcharo:
Heavy Attack: "Mercy"
When Calcharo has 3 "Cruelty", his Heavy Attack is replaced with Heavy Attack "Mercy".
When casting Heavy Attack "Mercy", Calcharo consumes 3 "Cruelty" to deal Electro DMG, considered as Heavy Attack DMG, and recovers Resonance Energy and Concerto Energy.

"Cruelty"
Calcharo can hold up to 3 "Cruelty".
Under Resonance Liberation Deathblade Gear state, "Cruelty" cannot be acquired.
When Resonance Skill Extermination Order hits the target, gain 1 "Cruelty".

Heavy Attack: "Death Messenger"
When Calcharo has 5 "Killing Intent", his Basic Attack is replaced with Heavy Attack "Death Messenger".
When casting Heavy Attack "Death Messenger", Calcharo consumes 5 "Killing Intent" to deal Electro DMG, considered as Resonance Liberation DMG, and recovers Resonance Energy and Concerto Energy.

"Killing Intent"
Under Resonance Liberation Deathblade Gear state, Calcharo's Forte Gauge is replaced with "Killing Intent", stacking up to 5.
When Basic Attack Hounds Roar hits the target, Calcharo gains 1 "Killing Intent".
